short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Increase browser speed and reduce memory load when you have numerous open tabs.
short.de: Erhöhe die Browsergeschwindigkeit und reduziere die Speicherauslastung, falls mehrere Tabs geöffnet sind.
short.es: Aumenta la velocidad del navegador y reduce el consumo de memoria cuando tengas numerosas pestañas abiertas.
short.fr: Augmente la vitesse du navigateur et libère de la mémoire lorsque de nombreux onglets sont ouverts
short.hu: Növeli a böngésződ sebességét és csökkenti memória igényét amikor sok lap van nyitva.
short.it: Aumenta la velocità del browser e riduce il peso sulla memoria  quando hai molte schede aperte
short.ja: たくさんのタブを開いている時のメモリ使用量を軽減し、ブラウザを高速化します。
short.nl: Verhoog de browsersnelheid en verlaag de geheugenbelasting als u veel tabbladen hebt geopend.
short.pt_BR: Aumente a velocidade do navegador e reduza a carga de memória quando você tiver várias abas abertas.
short.ru: Увеличьте скорость работы браузера и уменьшите потребление памяти, когда у вас открыто бесчисленное количество вкладок.
short.sv: Öka webbläsarens hastighet och reducera minnesbelastningen när du har många öppnade flikar.
short.uk: Збільшіть  швидкість браузера та зменшіть навантаження на пам’ять, коли у вас є численні відкриті вкладки.
short.zh_CN: 如果您打开了很多标签页，这个扩展能提升浏览器速度并减少内存占用。
short.zh_TW: 當打開多個分頁時，提高瀏覽器速度並減少記憶體負載。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
"Auto Tab Discard" is a lightweight browser extension that automatically reduces the amount of memory used by open but inactive tabs, helping to conserve battery life on portable devices by disabling JavaScript code and DOM events on discarded tabs.

Preview:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ityhxUPp3y8

Instruction:

There are two options on the extension's interface to either discard tabs or release discarding (the "x" buttons)


The features of "Auto Tab Discard" are:

  * Improves browser performance and reduces memory usage by automatically or manually discarding inactive, idle, or forgotten tabs.
  * Includes a list of hostnames or regular expressions that can be excluded from auto-discarding.
  * Preserves the discarded state of tabs when the browser is closed and reopened.
  * Indicates the discarded state of a tab through the favicon or title.
  * Restores the state of a tab, including scroll position and text box content, after it is released from being discarded.
  * Allows for the forced discarding of specified hostnames.


The options for configuring whether tabs should be discarded or not include:

  * Pinned tabs
  * Tabs that are playing media
  * The presence of a power source
  * Unsaved content or user input in a tab

The available plugins for "Auto Tab Discard" are:

  * Release the discarded state of the next or previous tab.
  * Release the discarded state of all tabs in the active window.
  * Automatically discard all newly opened inactive tabs.
  * Store YouTube's timestamp before a tab is discarded.
  * Permanently delete (remove) old discarded tabs that are inactive.

Notes:

  * Unlike the "The Great Suspender" extension, this extension uses the native method for discarding tabs, which means that even if the extension is removed or the browser crashes, your browser will automatically restore everything for you.

Privacy Policy:

https://webextension.org/privacy-policy/extension/tab-discard.html
long.de,fr,ru,uk:
Auto Tab Discard a lightweight extension that automatically reduces the memory load of open?but inactive?tabs. This also helps portable devices to save battery.

Extension preview:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ityhxUPp3y8

Features:
1. Speeds up your browser and minimizes memory usage: Inactive, idle, or forgotten tabs can be auto-discarded after a configurable period of time, or discarded manually from the toolbar menu.
2. Designate specific tabs (websites) to be whitelisted to prevent discarding.
3. Discarded tabs can be retained after closing and re-opening your browser.
4. The tab?s favicon displays the discarded state.
5. Tabs are restored with all information intact (like scroll position or the content of text boxes).
6. When a tab is discarded, no JavaScript code or dom event is active (basically, the tab is paused).

Options (there are a few options to customize when a tab gets discarded):
1. When a tab is pinned
2. When there is a media source playing inside a tab
3. When the computer is connected to a power source
4. When there is a form element (with changes) that has not yet been submitted.
long.es,ja,pt_BR:
Auto Tab Discard a lightweight extension that automatically reduces the memory load of open?but inactive?tabs. This also helps portable devices to save battery.

Extension preview:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ityhxUPp3y8

Features:
1. Speeds up your browser and minimizes memory usage: Inactive, idle, or forgotten tabs can be auto-discarded after a configurable period of time, or discarded manually from the toolbar menu.
2. Designate specific tabs (websites) to be whitelisted to prevent discarding.
3. Discarded tabs can be retained after closing and re-opening your browser.
4. The tab?s favicon displays the discarded state.
5. Tabs are restored with all information intact (like scroll position or the content of text boxes).
6. When a tab is discarded, no JavaScript code or dom event is active (basically, the tab is paused).

Options (there are a few options to customize when a tab gets discarded):
1. When a tab is pinned
2. When there is a media source playing inside a tab
3. When the computer is connected to a power source
4. When there is a form element (with changes) that has not yet been submitted.


Notes:
1. Unlike "The Great Suspender" extension, this extension uses the native method to discard tabs, which prevents losing the discarded tabs, when the extension is removed or when the browser crashes. There is no need for session restoring.
long.it:
Auto Tab Discard a lightweight extension that automatically reduces the memory load of open-but inactive-tabs. This also helps portable devices to save battery.

Extension preview:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ityhxUPp3y8

Features:
1. Speeds up your browser and minimizes memory usage: Inactive, idle, or forgotten tabs can be auto-discarded after a configurable period of time, or discarded manually from the toolbar menu.
2. Designate specific tabs (websites) to be whitelisted to prevent discarding.
3. Discarded tabs can be retained after closing and re-opening your browser.
4. The tab's favicon displays the discarded state.
5. Tabs are restored with all information intact (like scroll position or the content of text boxes).
6. When a tab is discarded, no JavaScript code or dom event is active (basically, the tab is paused).
7. Force discarding certain hostnames (e.g. you can immediately discard hostnames that use too much CPU or memory)

Options (there are a few options to customize when a tab gets discarded):
1. When a tab is pinned
2. When there is a media source playing inside a tab
3. When the computer is connected to a power source
4. When there is a form element (with changes) that has not yet been submitted.


Notes:
1. Unlike "The Great Suspender" extension, this extension uses the native method to discard tabs, which prevents losing the discarded tabs, when the extension is removed or when the browser crashes. There is no need for session restoring.
long.nl:
‘Auto Tab Discard’ is een lichtgewicht browserextensie die automatisch de door open maar inactieve tabbladen gebruikte hoeveelheid geheugen vermindert. Dit helpt de levensduur van de batterij op draagbare apparaten te verlengen door JavaScript-code en DOM-gebeurtenissen op gedeactiveerde tabbladen uit te schakelen.

Voorbeeld:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ityhxUPp3y8

Instructie:

Er zijn twee opties in de interface van de extensie om tabbladen ofwel te deactiveren, ofwel deze te heractiveren (de ‘x’-knoppen).


De functies van ‘Auto Tab Discard’ zijn:

  * Verbetert de browserprestaties en vermindert het geheugengebruik door automatisch of handmatig inactieve, niet-gebruikte of vergeten tabbladen te deactiveren.
  * Bevat een lijst van hostnamen of reguliere expressies die van automatisch deactiveren kunnen worden uitgesloten.
  * Behoudt de gedeactiveerde status van tabbladen wanneer de browser wordt gesloten en opnieuw wordt geopend.
  * Geeft de gedeactiveerde status van een tabblad aan via de favicon of titel.
  * Herstelt de status van een tabblad, waaronder de scrollpositie en inhoud van tekstvelden, nadat het deactiveren ervan is vrijgegeven (oftewel geheractiveerd).
  * Maakt gedwongen deactiveren van opgegeven hostnamen mogelijk.


De opties voor het configureren of tabbladen moeten worden gedeactiveerd of niet, bevatten:

  * Vastgemaakte tabbladen.
  * Tabbladen die media afspelen.
  * De aanwezigheid van een voedingsbron.
  * Niet-opgeslagen inhoud of gebruikersinvoer in een tabblad.

De beschikbare plug-ins voor ‘Auto Tab Discard’ zijn:

  * De gedeactiveerde status van het volgende of vorige tabblad vrijgeven.
  * De gedeactiveerde status van alle tabbladen in het actieve venster vrijgeven.
  * Automatisch alle nieuw geopende inactieve tabbladen deactiveren.
  * De tijdstempel van YouTube bewaren voordat een tabblad wordt gedeactiveerd.
  * Oude gedeactiveerde tabbladen die inactief zijn definitief verwijderen.

Opmerkingen:

  * In tegenstelling tot de extensie ‘The Great Suspender’ gebruikt deze extensie de ingebouwde methode voor het deactiveren van tabbladen, wat betekent dat zelfs als de extensie wordt verwijderd of de browser crasht, uw browser alles automatisch voor u zal herstellen.

Privacybeleid:

https://webextension.org/privacy-policy/extension/tab-discard.html
long.sv:
"Auto Tab Discard" is a lightweight browser extension that automatically reduces the memory load of open but inactive tabs. Tab discarding also helps portable devices to save battery (no JavaScript code or dom event is available anymore).

Extension Usage Preview:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ityhxUPp3y8

Instruction:
There are two options on the extension's interface to either discard tabs or release discarding (the "x" buttons)

Features:
1. Speeds up your browser and minimizes memory usage: Inactive, idle, or forgotten tabs can be auto-discarded after a configurable period or discarded manually
2. Supports a list of hostnames or regular expressions to prevent auto-discarding.
3. Keeps the discarding state after closing and re-opening the browser
4. Displays the discarded state on the favicon or title
5. Restores tab's state after releasing (scroll position, content of text boxes, and more).
6. Supports force discarding (immediately discarding of specified hostnames)

Options to configure when discarding:
1. Pinned tabs
2. Tabs that play media
3. Power source is present
4. Unsaved content or user input

Plugins:
1. Release discarding of the next or previous tab
2. Release discarding of all tabs in the active window
3. Discard all newly opened inactive tabs
4. Store YouTube's timestamp before discarding
5. Permanently delete (remove) old discarded tabs if they are inactive

Notes:
1. Unlike "The Great Suspender" extension, this extension uses the native method to discard tabs. Even if you remove the extension or the browser crashes, your browser restores everything for you!
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
Auto Tab Discard a lightweight extension that uses the native method (tabs.discard) to unload or suspend browser tabs to significantly reduce the memory footprint of your browser when many tabs are opened.

If you like to use many open tabs at once, this extension could help you to keep your browser fresh with low memory usage by parking (hibernating) inactive tabs to save up to 80% of the used memory.  This also helps portable devices to save battery.

Features:
1. Speeds up your browser and minimize the memory usage: Inactive, idle or forgotten tabs can be auto-suspended after a configurable period of time or be suspended manually from the toolbar popup.
2. Tabs (domains) can be whitelisted to avoid automatic suspension.
3. Suspended tabs are retained after closing and reopening browser (using your browser's session restore functionality)
4. Tab's favicon displays the suspension status (If the icon has opacity it is discarded)
5. Tabs are being restored with all information kept intact (like scroll position or the content of text boxes) when it becomes visible again
6. When a tab is discarded, no JavaScript code or dom event is active. Basically, the tab is paused.

Options: There are a few options to customize when a tab gets discarded:
1. Pinned tabs
2. When there is a media source playing inside a tab
3. When the computer is connected to a power source
4. When there is a form element (with changes) that has not yet been submitted.

Notes:
1. To prevent automatic tab discard, set the period to zero in the options page
2. You can lazy load tabs (open in the discarded mode) using the right-click context menu item.
